text:
DatHuis | Amsterdam, Netherlands | Product Engineer | ONSITE, Full-time | https://www.dathuis.nl

Selling your house and moving should be easy, almost frictionless. Why is this such a hard and frustrating experience for so many people? We are building SaaS solutions for brokers as well as consumer-facing products to increase transparency and efficiency in the market.

We are an investor-backed startup of currently two people looking for another experienced full-stack or front-end engineer with a strong interest in building products to join our team. As a developer, you are focused on writing admirable code and care about both stable and new technology. We donâ€™t believe in hierarchy or prioritise anyone's ideas, you will be an integral part in moving the company forward with a big impact on our technology stack.

Requirements

* Extensive experience with Javascript ( preferably with types )

* Strong motivation to create loved products with an eye for detail

* Experience with React.js and React Native

* Experience in GraphQL

* Fluent in English

Nice to have

* Entrepreneurial, with the aspiration to become a co-founder

* Experience in native mobile development

* Experience in a strongly typed language

Get free coffee and a pen with philipp@dathuis.nl
